series_title: Activities Authorized Under Construction Permit: Registration Statement Not Required
series_description: This series documents activities authorized under the Construction General Permit because the operator has coverage under an agreement in lieu of a plan, therefore a registration statement is not required to be submitted. This series may include, but is not limited to: compliance reports and correspondence.

series_title: Compliance and Inspections: Not Authorized Under Construction Permit
series_description: This series documents citizen concerns received by DEQ and inspections and compliance activities within the scope of the erosion and sediment control, and stormwater programs that are not and will not be authorized under a Construction Permit. This series may include, but is not limited to: correspondence, inspection reports, project related and compliance related documents pertaining to non-permitted land disturbance activities

series_title: Comprehensive Stormwater Management Plans for NonVirginia Stormwater Management Program (Non-VSMP)
series_description: This series documents the review and approval for Comprehensive Stormwater Management Plans, also referred to as Stormwater Management Master Plans, designed for entities/facilities where there is no locally-approved Virginia Stormwater Management Program and therefore DEQ is the direct VSMP Authority. This series may include, but is not limited to: correspondence, plan sheets, and approval letters.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Construction Stormwater Permit Compliance and Inspections
series_description: This series documents the agency's responsibilities pertaining to compliance with Construction Stormwater General and Individual Permits. This series may include, but is not limited inspections, correspondence, and compliance documentation.

This series documents the processing of general and construction permits. This series may include, but is not limited to: permit applications, registration statements, supplemental information, permits, coverage letters, fact sheets, notice of termination documents, and correspondence

series_title: Erosion and Sediment Control and Stormwater Management Standards and Specifications
series_description: This series documents the review and approval of standards and specifications for erosion and sediment control and stormwater management. This series may include, but is not limited to: correspondence, standard and specification documents, reports, and approval letters
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Erosion and Sediment Control and Stormwater Management Plan Review
series_description: This series documents the review and processing of erosion and sediment control and/or stormwater management plans. This series may include, but is not limiited to: plan submittals; transmittal, approval, and denial letters; and correspondence

series_title: Erosion and Sediment Control and Stormwater Management: Certifications
series_description: This series documents certification of persons in accordance
legal_citation: 9VAC25-850 -Virginia Erosion and Sediment Control and Stormwater Management Certification Regulations. This may include, but is not limited to: certificates and correspondence. 4VAC50-50-40; COV 10.1-561; COV 10.1561.1

series_title: Erosion and Sediment Control and Stormwater Management: Training
series_description: This series documents training required and taken by private and public individuals to become certified under the Erosion Sediment Control and Stormwater Management Certification Regulations. This series may include, but is not limited to: records of training events, attendance, and training materials

This series documents the agency's approval and review of a local government's erosion and sediment control and stormwater manangement programs. This series may include, but is not limited to: correspondence, reports, and ordinances
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_description: Documents This series documents the Best Management Practices and other structures built on a site to control post-construction stormwater after the development is finished, the agreement the maintenance of such structures, and agency inspections of the site and structures. This series may include, but is not limited to: construction record drawings, approved stormwater management plans, maintenance agreements, and inspection reports.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded

series_title: Virginia Erosion and Sediment Control and Stormwater Management Program Guidance and Reference Materials
series_description: This series documents current guidance pertaining to the Virginia Erosion and Sediment Control and Stormwater Management Program implementation. This series may but is not limited to: manuals, technical resources, Best Management Practices (BMP) specifications, Manufactured Treatment Device (MTD) submittals and approvals, and program guidance, policy or memorandums.
retention_statement: 0 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded
